column5: Yer NUTZZZZZZZZ LOL Im still on the hunt GCD.

I think everyone needs to buy a new boat so they can join me in the with-the-price-of-gas-what-the-hell-was-i-thinking-club.  The first rule of this club is to not speak about gas prices, but no one ever listens.
Just do what I do, swallow hard and quit thinking about it.
I wonder how, Minnow, is doing with his new rig?
I would never trust a guy with a Buffalo Carp in his hand...
Don't hold your breath Dawg...but you will be the first one I'll call     You just never know do you   ???  Yep...the double quote worked Brian...Thanks
Im not just  another pretty face Norm.
Will be getting my new-to-me boat on Sunday  http://peterborough.kijiji.ca:80/c-cars-ve...QQAdIdZ60840238
Will be getting mine in a couple of weeks!  17' Bass Tracker with a 50 horse Evinrude.  I'm so pumped, no more fishing out of tubes.  But no, you can't use it.

Watcha lookin' fer there GCD?  I've been looking since April.  Cannot decide what I want.  So far I have a new motor and that is it.  All I can say about that is, holy crap what a difference, much more powerful, quieter and uses hardly any gas.
Hey Glen....make it a minimalist trip for you.  Some chest waders and a float tube is all you need!  Don't forget the swim fins.  No need to trailer and good on gas.

New boat whats that mine is 3 months old and has some new battle scars.Not new anymore.  Lets see daughters friend drove into the boat in the driveway  on a bicycle and left a nice 18 inch scratch in the hull.  I am not complaining about the gas with this boat which consumes less than $10 per day its pulling it with the van that costs $$$$$$$$$$$$$$  Besides some new scratches on the doc I am lovin it.  Problem is my boy is catching all the fish
No new boat here, but i'm trying to win one.    If i win, i will bring it to lakeair in Sept and let you "put it through it's paces".  Cheers,  FOTB
Got her home last night. Will take more pics later. She's rough, old, and a little tired, but she floats.
I have one you can borrow if you want.Not so good on gas but she runs pretty good in skinny water. Joe
I'm sure I'll get her back to form.
